title: North Country National Scenic Trail: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes      No fees are charged for hiking on the trail but fees may be required for parking, camping, or entrance at various sections along the trail.  The North Country Trail Association's website lists the following sites as requiring camping or entrance fees.Some National Forest Recreation Areas and CampgroundsPictured Rocks National Lakeshore (MI)North Dakota State ParksMinnesota State ParksWisconsin State Parks and ForestsMichigan State landsOhio State Parks (generally park entrance is free, fees apply only for overnight use)Pennsylvania State Parks (generally park entrance is free, fees apply only for overnight use and certain day use activities)New York State Parks For more information, please check ahead with the responsible agency or landowner.
